Very Low.title: Rebuilding Self-Worth
Very Low.description: Your self-esteem is currently very low. Remember, your worth is inherent and not based on achievement.

tips.title: Stop Comparison
tips.description: Take a break from social media if it triggers comparisons.

tips.title: Self-Forgiveness
tips.description: Forgive yourself for past mistakes. They are opportunities to learn, not definitions of you.

tips.title: Affirmations
tips.description: Start your day with a simple positive statement about yourself.

Low.title: Nurturing Confidence
Low.description: You may be doubting yourself often. Let's work on being your own cheerleader.

tips.title: List Strengths
tips.description: Write down 5 things you are good at or like about yourself.

tips.title: Accept Compliments
tips.description: When someone compliments you, simply say 'Thank you' instead of deflecting.

tips.title: Small Wins
tips.description: Set very small goals and celebrate achieving them.

Moderate.title: Stable Self-View
Moderate.description: Your self-esteem is moderate. You have a realistic view but could be kinder to yourself.

tips.title: Positive Self-Talk
tips.description: Notice when you are critical of yourself and try to rephrase it kindly.

tips.title: Boundaries
tips.description: Practice saying 'no' to things that drain you to respect your own needs.

tips.title: Self-Care
tips.description: Dedicate time each week purely for doing things you enjoy.

Moderate-High.title: Healthy Confidence
Moderate-High.description: You have a solid sense of self-worth. Keep nurturing this healthy perspective.

tips.title: Challenge Yourself
tips.description: Step slightly outside your comfort zone to prove your resilience.

tips.title: Help Others
tips.description: Use your confidence to support others who might be struggling.

tips.title: Reflect
tips.description: Journal about your personal values and how you are living them.

High.title: Strong Self-Esteem
High.description: You have a very healthy relationship with yourself. This is a powerful foundation.

tips.title: Leadership
tips.description: Your confidence can inspire others; consider taking lead in a group.

tips.title: Resilience
tips.description: Use your self-belief to tackle long-term difficult goals.

tips.title: Continuous Growth
tips.description: Focus on growth and learning rather than proving yourself.
